mapper.select:
and p.org_id in
#{item.id}
and lower(p.`name`) like concat(concat('%', lower(#{keywords})), '%')
order by p.id

select p.id from project p left join rel_project_admin rpa on rpa.project_id = p.id where p.user_id = #{userId} or rpa.user_id = #{userId} union select p.id from project p left join rel_user_organization ruo on ruo.org_id = p.org_id left join organization o on o.id = p.org_id where o.user_id = #{userId} or (ruo.user_id = #{userId} and ruo.role > 0)

select p.*, u.`id` AS 'createBy.id', if(u.`name` is null, u.`username`, u.`name`) AS 'createBy.username', u.`avatar` AS 'createBy.avatar', o.`id` AS 'organization.id', o.`name` AS 'organization.name', o.`description` AS 'organization.description', o.`avatar` AS 'organization.avatar', o.`user_id` AS 'organization.userId', o.`project_num` AS 'organization.projectNum', o.`member_num` AS 'organization.memberNum', o.`role_num` AS 'organization.teamNum', o.`allow_create_project` AS 'organization.allowCreateProject', o.`member_permission` AS 'organization.memberPermission', o.`create_time` AS 'organization.createTime', o.`create_by` AS 'organization.createBy', o.`update_time` AS 'organization.updateTime', o.`update_by` AS 'organization.updateBy' from project p left join organization o on o.`id` = p.`org_id` left join `user` u on u.`id` = p.`user_id` where p.`id` = #{id}
